francais: Période des cinq dynasties et des dix royaumes
English: Five Dynasties (in different contexts, from mythology through to Han and the interregnum between Han and Tang)

the five dynasties forming the interregnum between Tang and Song (936-947), namely: Later Liang `後~`梁~|`后~`梁~[Hou4 Liang2], Later Tang `後~`唐~|`后~`唐~[Hou4 Tang2], Later Jin `後~`晉~|`后~晋[Hou4 Jin4], Later Han `後漢~|`后~汉[Hou4 Han4], Later Zhou `後~`周~|`后~`周~[Hou4 Zhou1]
